usercssData.name: YouTube Glass - Modern Glassy UI for YouTube
usercssData.author: Stellan Stafford
usercssData.description: I have received an email recently describing all of the changes I should make to this theme. Be excited for new things to come! - 4/6/23    YouTube Glass is a modern web theme for YouTube.com that adds frosted glass blur effects to most panels and UI elements. It adds more curved panels and animations to the UI. With custom theme colors, blur effects, and chip colors, this theme will put the You in (You)Tube.    Report all errors and issues to RG form  https://forms.office.com/r/sAYTdrg8wn    Keywords:  Shadows, Animate, Animated, Transition, Dark Mode, Aero Glass, Modern, Custom Background, Homepage Background, Blur effects, Frosted Glass, Windows 11

options.name: yeahya
options.label: Yes (Enable CUSTBG features - Disable YouTube Video Ambient mode on the site & Disable Fullblack)

options.name: DBDDESC
options.label: Discreet Body*

TranEvery.label: Enable Transitions on everything in YouTube
TranEvery.name: TranEvery

options.name: DTREVERY
options.label: No (Stick to normal RG on YouTube)*

options.name: CorChi
options.label: Corner Chip*

options.name: Tabpop
options.label: Tab Popout

It adds more curved panels and animations to the UI. With custom theme colors, blur effects, and chip colors, this theme will put the You in (You)Tube.
